column5: Just posting to try and evoke some fan energy from all of you!! Go Leafs go!!!  <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="
Nice. I've been a fan since around 87-88 era. It hurts, but there my team. GO LEAFS GO!!!
Awsome talent for sure - just imagine how good he would be if he had a good team infront of him!  lol  Tracker (Don)

Did I read or hear playoff drive?  They have been on that drive since the lockout, might be time for a new driver!!!  Sorry me Leaf brudders I couldn`t resist, you guys just keep beating the Bruins. I hope we can help with your drive by beating the Sabres tonite!!!
The kid has played well but 28 games does not a career make, what ever happened to the monster??
Tonight is a big night. A leafs win and a sabres loss would be a big step forward.

This worked last week... Lets see if this one helps at all.. Besides THIS IS FREAKIN AWESOME!!!  OPTIMUS REIME, BABY!!!  <iframe title="YouTube video player" width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/zFwP9qUay4Q" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
<iframe title="YouTube video player" width="480" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/P9D0YFMvGQw" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
My Pleasure!   were gonna win tonight...I can feel it!
Now a sabre loss tonight would be awesome.

I like that video and Riemer is amazing hes the best thing to happen to the Leafs in a while. I was born a Leafs fan. So was my daughter lol wearing a leafs jersey from day one, just not in public lol. But I hope that they make the playoffs. If they do Riemer is the reason.

Well it seems as thou its working so here's yet another video..Just as sweet as the others!!  <iframe title="YouTube video player" width="480" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/qoNWhooukK8" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Oh My. Didnanyone see that beaut by Kadri? lol made me a very happy man!!!!
There's always next year Leaf fans    .
